alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:31AM MST until February 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Check road conditions before heading out. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow may create poor visibility at times, including near white-out conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
